hero.heading: Jump into the World of Coding
hero.subHeading: Catapult Your Career with Advanced Programming skills within 10 weeks!

infoCards.heading: 10-Week Masterclass
infoCards.text: Transform from a normal human being to a Ninja Programmer and unlock your hidden talent within just 10 weeks.

infoCards.heading: Direct Interaction with Industry-Experienced Instructor
infoCards.text: A Masters’ Degree graduate in Artificial Intelligence from one of the world’s top 30 universities.

infoCards.heading: Small Groups
infoCards.text: Be part of a small classroom of only 8 students to maximise and optimise your learning experience.

infoCards.heading: Weekly Challenges
infoCards.text: Mentally-challenging exercises to keep your programming skills sharpened for the next class.

infoCards.heading: Certificate & GitHub Repository
infoCards.text: Get certified and build your GitHub repository portfolio, which you can showcase to potential empoloyers.

infoCards.heading: Lifetime Support
infoCards.text: E-mail us anytime about anything related to the AI, ML or Data Science, even after your course has ended.

programmes.heading: beginner
programmes.text: Build simple and fun applications in Python, the most powerful programming language today.

programmes.heading: advanced
programmes.text: Learn how to apply advanced programming skills to solve problems related to AI, Machine Learning & Data Science.

testimonial.title: See What a Former Student has to Say
testimonial.text: “ The instructor is able to make complex and complicated concepts clear and understandable, without me having prior knowledge and adequate exposure to programming. He guided me through the basics and fundamentals which allowed me to apply that knowledge and tackle my own projects independently. Thanks to his support and encouragement, I scored an A in my SPM Sains Komputer. It was definitely a fun and engaging learning experience. In fact, thanks to his exposure and influence, I am now pursuing my degree in Computer Science! “

author.name: Afifah Azman
author.post: Former Student, currently pursuing Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, majoring in Cybersecurity

section3.title: jumpstart your coding journey with us
section3.text:
Join our next intake today!
Slots are limited to only 10 students per class per intake. Hurry up and enquire to book your slot!
